description:
Jot Extension for Desktop and Mobile Firefox saves information about the current web page and any active text selection.

These time-stamped entries can be downloaded as JSON or in user-defined file formats, preset to timeclock and csv format.

Context menu entry on Android is only avaliable on hyperlinks, because text selection is mutually exclusive with a context menu there.
